question:
Consider the following statements about the Integrated Guided Missile Development Programme (IGMDP):
  1. It was conceived under the leadership of Dr. A.P.J. Abdul Kalam
  2. The programme was managed by ISRO and Ordinance Factories Board 
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: First statement is correct. Second statement is incorrect because the programme was managed by DRDO and Ordinance Factories Board. The programme was conceived under the leadership of Dr. A.P.J. Abdul Kalam. The DRDO announced the successful completion of the IGMDP on 8 January 2008, and the last missile developed under the programme was the Agni-3.
